I wore this outfit to the gym today and it was sooo comfortable. I bought the Royal Blue in 2XL. I am 5'4" and 186lbs. The top was not tight, which is what I wanted. The pants seem to be a little smaller because they are a snug fit. This is not overly thin material. I am ordering another one.
Nice item for the cost and soooo comfy with material guality...can't beat this👍🏾

This two-piece set was exactly what I was looking for. I am 5'7" and weigh 280lb, and the XXL fits perfect—not tight and not loose. I will be ordering other colors. Fast shipping.

I love the fit but please size up it’s a snug fit.. overall I like what I ordered .. I ordered the grey but in the picture it’s a darker grey but when received it was light grey not a problem still cute

Not even worth zero stars.

I ordered the pink thinking it would look more like a pink/mauve, but the color is very brightly pink. Outside of the pink, I do appreciate the thickness of the material, the warmth, and the fit. Just perfect and cute for running errands or leisure wear.
Very form fiting jogger set. Fits to size, lightly fleece material. Breathable. Shirr has side and middle pockets.

评论详情: I purchased multiple colors and I packed them for my trip. I am not going to over pack again, these suits will cover everywhere I plan to go. I love them, the material is fabulous.

the set is very comfortable and the color is as show there are built in pockets in the top the leggings are tall girl friendly I'm 5;8 and my ankles aren't exposed.

Not sure exactly how warm you would be if you live somewhere it gets really cold. Wanted to love this outfit so bad but it was not for me.

Very comfortable sweat suit, nice vibrant blue color. Fits to size. I don’t like the pockets on the shirt, they stick out instead of being flat. But overall I like to wear it while I work from home since it very comfortable.
Nice jogger set. Material is soft and has some stretch. The grey was not as dark as shown on the picture!
Very cute, the material is more  of a polyester feel though. Super cute and fits true to size
Very warm set for the winter. It has a fleece lining so it will keep you warm.

Ordered the XL in black (I’m medium shaped ). Love the top because it’s actually fall wear and the best part, it has POCKETS at the waist! However, the pants, not as thick as the top but not see through. Top 5/5 bottom 3/5 stars. Super comfy with soft cotton stretch. If you have dimples in lower half, you’ll need shape wear to hid a little.

I got this 2 piece red sweatsuit because I don't typically wear red and because it's fall/winter season where I'm at and I also needed to update my wardrobe with a something new. I wore this outfit once so far and it fit comfortably, but I still had a little room in it. I believe I got a size XL, but a L would have fit me too. I would say if you like your sweatsuits fitting a little more snug, go a size down, if you like it a little more baggy, size up. Recommend.

The material is thick enough to keep you warm but still breathable, making it perfect for lounging or running errands. The set fits true to size and has a flattering silhouette. A versatile and comfortable outfit that’s great for casual days!

I love this outfit it fits perfect. I wear it with my slide on shoes or sneakers. The stretch is perfect the color is a very vibrant blue. I love the pockets on the jacket.  I have no cons about this outfit no fade after washing.
Fits true to size and looks cute
True to size. Great quality for the price.
I got this 2-piece set in Pink, size Large.  So soft and comfy. Like the bright vivid color. I wish the pants had pockets but luckily the sweater did. True to size and quality material.
I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of the Nimsruc 2 Piece Outfits For Women Sweatsuits Sets. The fabric is soft and the stitching is well done. Definitely worth the purchase.
The Nimsruc 2 Piece Outfits For Women Sweatsuits Sets is a great value for the price. The quality is excellent, and the set looks more expensive than it is. Definitely recommend!

I'm absolutely in love with it! The material is so soft and comfortable, and the fit is perfect. The pullover is a great way to stay warm on chilly days, and the jogger pants are perfect for lounging around the house or running errands. I love the fact that the pants have pockets, which is always a bonus. The material is not the most breathable, so it just makes this perfect for colder weather. The set is also very affordable, so it's a great value for the price.

I like how comfortable it is, I really like the feel of it in the inside it feels super soft. I I did not like how long it took to arrive, it took over a month. The neckline is snug, this could be good for wind blocking, the pockets are really small, my phone kept falling out. I am giving it 4 stars due to the pockets. The pants have no pockets either. The blue color is the exact color as sonic the hedgehog, I kept getting comments about that while I was wearing it. Overall a good set for the price $20 USD. I would get it again in a different color, if it had bigger pockets.
This is a really cute sweatsuit! I love that the pants are more like workout pants than sweats. Each piece is fleece lined. These will be perfect for really cold weather. I’d recommend!

Pleasantly surprised with this set. It’s SO COMFY. I wouldn’t call it a sweatsuit actually, it’s not your typical sweatsuit material. It’s quite thin, yet very warm. Ordered a size large, typically a medium/large. It’s super comfy, I definitely could’ve gone with a medium (should’ve). I’m 5’8”, 160ish for reference. I plan to use it for errands/lounging. Also, the top has pockets, if it weren’t great enough already, right?  Obviously recommend.
This is so soft against the skin I love it! Super comfortable and the top has pockets. I’m 5ft 152 lbs and the small fit great.

This set is absolutely perfect for the fall weather.  It's soft, it's warm, and it's comfortable.  For the fall weather it's not too hot or too cool to wear during those chilling fall days.  I love the colors, the material, and how nice it fits. ❤️
I'm 5'8 205lbs and the xl fit me well. The material is thick and will be perfect for winter this year. The material is soft and comfortable to wear and will definitely keep you warm.
This 2 piece outfit is incredibly comfortable and also very flattering. The long sleeve pullover and jogger sweat pants accentuate my curves in all the right places. Highly recommend!
The fabric is warm and soft and comfortable to wear. The gray color is just like the ad photo. My wife will wear this around the house as fall turns to winter.
Great material. Fits well flattering. Well made. Super soft material. Great value.
